text: وَلَوۡ نَزَّلۡنَا عَلَيۡكَ كِتَٰبٗا فِي قِرۡطَاسٖ فَلَمَسُوهُ بِأَيۡدِيهِمۡ لَقَالَ ٱلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوٓاْ إِنۡ هَٰذَآ إِلَّا سِحۡرٞ مُّبِينٞ

translation.en: And even if We had sent down to you, [O Muhammad], a written scripture on a page and they touched it with their hands, the disbelievers would say, "This is not but obvious magic
translation.id: Dan sekiranya Kami turunkan kepadamu (Muhammad) tulisan di atas kertas, lalu mereka dapat memegangnya dengan tangan mereka sendiri, niscaya orang-orang kafir itu akan berkata, "Ini tidak lain hanyalah sihir yang nyata
